divs: Sighting DetailsMyself and a friend were driving back from Eastern Michigan University that night listening to WJR a clear channel radio station in the Detroit Michigan. We heard Mark Avery calling in to WJR with a call to the Warren Pierce show on his way to I think Florida tell him about a UFO near the new I275 freeway. My friend and listened all the way down home that night and heard reports the whole way from other viewers it just so happened we spotted in the way home on US23 North approaching the North Territorial Road exit. We got off at that exit and stopped at viewed it. The object hung with no sound, no hanging motor pods, no rudder or elevator, and no hanging gondola. So I ruled not a blimp. It also had concave marks on the side. I hung above the trees low enough that I could have thrown a snow and hit it.
Summary: Driving N. on US23 and N. Territorial exit.
